content.text: Match ends, Manchester City 4, Borussia Mönchengladbach 0.
Second Half ends, Manchester City 4, Borussia Mönchengladbach 0.
Attempt missed. Kevin De Bruyne (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left from a direct free kick.
Aleksandar Kolarov (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Tobias Strobl (Borussia Mönchengladbach).
Goal!  Manchester City 4, Borussia Mönchengladbach 0. Kelechi Iheanacho (Manchester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Leroy Sané.
Attempt saved. Aleksandar Kolarov (Manchester City) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Kevin De Bruyne.
Aleksandar Kolarov (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Thorgan Hazard (Borussia Mönchengladbach).
Substitution, Manchester City. Kelechi Iheanacho replaces Sergio Agüero.
Hand ball by Sergio Agüero (Manchester City).
Substitution, Manchester City. Gaël Clichy replaces Ilkay Gündogan.
Substitution, Borussia Mönchengladbach. Ibrahima Traoré replaces Lars Stindl.

Foul by Julian Korb (Borussia Mönchengladbach).
Substitution, Manchester City. Leroy Sané replaces Raheem Sterling.
Offside, Manchester City. Raheem Sterling tries a through ball, but Sergio Agüero is caught offside.

Goal!  Manchester City 3, Borussia Mönchengladbach 0. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Raheem Sterling with a through ball.
Attempt saved. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) right footed shot from very close range is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Jesús Navas with a cross.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Yann Sommer.
